text: Working on the creation of MaaS products within the development team as a Front-end developer and UX/UI designer for both web and app interfaces.

Responsible for the Quality department in Auto, Home, and Life insurance lines. My role included coordinating and training a team of 132 employees and new recruits. I actively participated in the development of action plans aimed at achieving the established objectives.
text2: Additionally, I played a key role in efficiently resolving claims to ensure customer satisfaction.
